code: import React from'react';import{FiThermometer,FiDroplet,FiSun,FiCloud}from'react-icons/fi';import'./SensorSummary.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SensorSummary=_ref=>{let{sensor}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sensor-summary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"sensor-name",children:sensor.sensor_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metrics-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metric",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiThermometer,{className:"metric-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"metric-label",children:"Temperature"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"metric-value",children:[sensor.temperature,"\xB0C"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metric",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiDroplet,{className:"metric-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"metric-label",children:"Humidity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"metric-value",children:[sensor.humidity,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metric",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiSun,{className:"metric-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"metric-label",children:"Heat Index"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"metric-value",children:[sensor.heat_index,"\xB0C"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metric",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiCloud,{className:"metric-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"metric-label",children:"Dew Point"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"metric-value",children:[sensor.dew_point,"\xB0C"]})]})]})]});};export default SensorSummary;
